basic_info.description: I'm Rivka Muller, graduate of the diploma title RNCP nÂ°32173 'Web Developer', an associate degree, after an OpenClassrooms training. I decided to follow this course, following the obtaining of the Professional Certificate Technician development computer applications (CP16), course which I followed at the cnam. Apart from the java language, I learned there the basics of web development. As a web developer, I am constantly seeking to improve myself and am motivated to use my skills and enrich my experiences.

projects.title: Booki, travel agency
projects.description: Integrate content according to a model with HTML & CSS while respecting the responsive aspect of the site.

projects.title: Sophie Buel, interior designer
projects.description: Create a login page in html and manage the user login via calls to the provided API. Creation of a project filter in the gallery, and creation of a modal to upload new media. The back-end code as well as the API were provided.

projects.title: Menu Maker by Qwenta
projects.description: Write the technical specifications of a project based on functional needs, follow the progress of the project using a project management tool, divide the functionalities into tasks and present the technical solution.

projects.title: Nina Carducci, photograph site
projects.description: Improvement of the site which is already provided, I have to improve its SEO and its accessibility as well as correct bugs.

projects.title: Kasa , rental agency
projects.description: Develop interface elements of a website using React components and configure navigation between application pages with React Router.

projects.title: My old Grimoire, book rating site
projects.description: Realization of the Backend of the site by implementing CRUD operations and storing data securely.
